detail_desc: Trousers in a viscose and linen weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and fake fly. Decorative tie belt at the front and tapered legs.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved body in cotton jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Set with a pair of mittens and a hat with earflaps in a fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, ties under the chin and a fleece lining. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Size 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, a seam at the hem and a ribbed, rounded peplum.
T-shirt in patterned slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and raw-edge hem. Dropped shoulders with press-studs and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Large, block-coloured scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Jumpsuit in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and cap sleeves with decorative ties. Smocked seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with lace details. Moulded, padded, opening cups, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and string back. The polyamide content of the briefs is recycled.

Voluminous, A-line tunic in an airy cotton weave with a double-layered, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Long balloon sleeves with smocking at the top and cuffs with pearly buttons. Smocking below and a wide gathered tier creating movement to the hem. Airy cotton weave lining.
Long metal earrings decorated with velvet-covered plastic beads and fabric tassels. Length 15 cm.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles.
Short dungaree dress in soft fabric with adjustable straps with metal fasteners at the front. Lined at the top.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbed details and inset mesh sections. High waist with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, button fly, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace yoke.
Sleeveless top in a soft viscose weave containing some linen with a V-neck front and back, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and broderie anglaise at the top.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved top in a soft, crinkled velvet, viscose and silk blend. High collar with an overlocked edge, a concealed zip at the back with gathers at the top, straight, wide sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in thin, printed cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.

Wide blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a wide collar that ties at the front, and buttons at the top. Gathered yoke at back, gathers at the shoulders, long balloon sleeves and cuffs with a covered button.
Short dungaree dress in stretch, patterned cotton twill with adjustable shoulder straps, buttons at the sides and a front pocket. Unlined.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover front and back and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Seam under the bust with elastication at the back, and short, wide sleeves.
Cargo trousers in washed Oxford cotton with side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud, seams at the knees and drawstring hems.
Thin antiqued metal chain necklaces with pendants. Length 62 cm and 75 cm.
Two-piece set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with lapped shoulders and long sleeves. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch, cotton-blend jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.

Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck and tie detail at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce on the shoulders and at the cuffs. An elasticated seam at the waist, and a flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neck, flounces at the top and butterfly sleeves. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Trousers woven in an airy, textured cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.

Off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with elastication at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Airy jersey underskirt.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Suede espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings, jute insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline with gathers at the front and an opening with a concealed button at the back. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with sparkly stones and slits. Straight-cut hem. Lined.

Short dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover front. 3/4-length sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and scalloped trim around the neckline, sleeve-ends and hem. Partly lined.

Boiler suit in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Flap chest pockets, front and back pockets, a detachable belt with D-rings at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Dress in glittery, stretch velour with short sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Hi-tops in fabric and imitation leather with a padded edge, hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Fleece linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide top in a stretchy, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and a straight hem.

Set with a top and jeans. Top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery print motif and short cap sleeves. 5-pocket slim-fit jeans in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Wrapover blouse in airy, pattern-weave fabric made from a cotton blend with a crinkled effect. V-neck, narrow ties at the waist and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in cotton flannel with a detachable, lined hood in jersey and a yoke at the back. Buttons down the front and at the cuffs, an open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cotton rib knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft slippers with embroidery and appliqués. High shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Oversized joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and elasticated hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Short, sleeveless dress in a jacquard weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend. Small frilled collar, a V-shaped opening with ties at the front, and a seam at the hem for added width. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned chiffon with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a decorative bow at the waist. Lined.
Short dress in jersey with a lace back and long raglan sleeves. V-neck with an open section at the back, seam at the waist and gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a wide lace band at the waist, concealed zip at the back and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides.
Sunglasses with metal frames, plastic details and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Slightly wider, straight-cut T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with decorative stitching around the sleeves and hem.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with a chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with appliqués, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Knitted biker jacket in soft bouclé made from a wool blend. Notch lapels with press-studs, shoulder tabs with press-studs and a diagonal zip down the front. Chest pocket, zipped side pockets, a small flap front pocket with a press-stud, and one inner pocket. Zips at the cuffs and loops at the hem. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Knitted jumper with a motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Matching pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Single-breasted jacket woven in a linen blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Blouse in airy fabric with a gathered, elasticated boat neck, long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
